sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AlertController } from '@ionic/angular'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-medic-emergency-details', templateUrl: './medic-emergency-details.page.html', styleUrls: ['./medic-emergency-details.page.scss'], }) export class MedicEmergencyDetailsPage implements OnInit { constructor(private router:Router, public alertController: AlertController) { } ngOnInit() { } selectedOption: string = 'serious'; otherInput: string = ''; optionSelected() { if (this.selectedOption !== 'other') { this.otherInput = ''; } } async presentAlert() { const alert = await this.alertController.create({ header: 'End Emergency?', subHeader: 'Patient and vitals records will be available', cssClass:'alert-dialog', buttons: [ { text: 'Cancel', role: 'cancel', cssClass: 'alert-button-cancel' }, { text: 'End', cssClass: 'alert-button-ok-red', handler: () => { this.router.navigate(["./tabs/on-scene"]) }, }, ], }); await alert.present(); } } Emergency Details

Record vitals and patient information
